attributes.action: Force heads of all political parties to sit down and discuss brexit negotiations
attributes.additional_details:
Force them to be adults and discuss accordingly as part of their roles. There is clearly too much childish behaviour and politicians need reminding what their position is and WHO they are acting on behalf.

Please sign just as a reminder to these politicians what their important job is about and force them to talk together honestly and transparently for us.
attributes.background:
Regardless of your stance on Britain exiting the EU please sign this petition to force the heads of each party to sit down and have open and honest discussion.

Brexit has become shameful and these 'leaders' need to act on OUR behalf and not have petty disputes or childish views.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
